headline.main: Madagascar's Role; Island's Situation, Airfields, Naval Base Contribute to Its Importance in War

lead_paragraph: The great island of Madagascar, with its naval base at Diego Suarez, one of the finest natural harbors in the world, has assumed in the past week a new significance in the complicated strategy of the Indian Ocean.
abstract: Madagascar: H W Baldwin on importance
snippet: The great island of Madagascar, with its naval base at Diego Suarez, one of the finest natural harbors in the world, has assumed in the past week a new significance in the complicated strategy of the Indian Ocean....
